doctor.name: Dr. Tahmina Sultana (Shimul)
doctor.degree: MBBS, BCS (Health), DDV (BSMMU), MCPS, FCPS (Skin & VD)
doctor.specialty: Skin, Allergy, Hair, Nail, Sexual Diseases Specialist & Dermato Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Tahmina Sultana (Shimul) is a highly qualified Skin, Allergy, Hair, Nail, Sexual Diseases Specialist, and Dermato Surgeon in Dhaka. She holds MBBS, BCS (Health), DDV (BSMMU), MCPS, and FCPS (Skin & VD) degrees and currently serves as an Assistant Professor in the Department of Dermatology at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. Dr. Tahmina Sultana (Shimul) specializes in the treatment of skin diseases, allergies, hair loss, nail disorders, acne, eczema, psoriasis, fungal infections, vitiligo, sexually transmitted diseases (STDs), and cosmetic dermatological procedures. She provides consultations at Digilab Medical Services Ltd, located at House # 02, Road # 06, Block-A, Mirpur-10, Dhaka, from 7:00 pm to 9:00 pm, except on Fridays.
